title: "If/Then" brings Idina Menzel, Broadway stars to Denver
text:
Published By: Denver Post Entertainment - Today 
In the opening number of "If/Then," the newly liberated heroine ponders "what if?" It is not the only song in Tom Kitt and Brian Yorkey's he...
